# ComBatRefPackaged

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a fork of [ComBat-ref](https://github.com/xiaoyu12/Combat-ref) to provide an installable package.  

## Installation

You can install the development version of ComBatRefPackaged like so:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("nghiaagent/ComBatRefPackaged")
```

## Help
To check the help file:
```{r example}
?ComBatRefPackaged::ComBat_ref
```

## Cite
[Highly Effective Batch Effect Correction Method for RNA-seq Count Data](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/39802213/)
